2099120.name: STARR RINGER
2099120.description:
In the year 1173 GCT(Galactic Core Time), above a distant planet at the edge of the galaxy is an ancient gateway to a pocket universe filled with unimaginable horrors. A dangerous group is initiating their plan to unleash the chaos realm upon the universe and only YOU can stop them! Take up arms and blast your way through the cosmos to destroy the gate and save the galaxy!

Fight off the forces of chaos and bring order back to the universe using 5 unique weapons each with 4 levels of power!
Collect upgrades and destroy the cosmic horrors that are wreaking havoc on the universe.

Play through Hard and Nightmare difficulties to unlock the ultimate challenge! Test your skills and get your name in the top 100 on the leaderboards!

STARR RINGER has full controller support.

Music by Druaga1
